title: USAJOBS - Search
text: Save this search When you save a search, we'll automatically send you email updates with any new job that matches what you're looking for. When you save a search, we'll automatically send you email updates with any new job that matches what you're looking for. We want to help you find the right job. Try entering a keyword or location, or use the filters. Search for jobs that allow you to work full time from your home or an approved alternative worksite. What is a remote job? Enter a keyword or locationâ€”Start typing and we'll offer suggestions to narrow your search. If you search by a city, we'll include jobs within a 25-mile radius. Use one or more filters to search for jobs by hiring path, pay, departments, job series and more options under More Filters. The number after each filter type tells how many jobs are available. Your results will update as you select each filter. Your profile tells us if you're eligible for a specific hiring path and your work preferences including job location, schedule, amount of travel and more. When you're signed in and start a job search, we'll look for jobs that match your profile. You can always update your profile or turn it off. You can save a search to automatically look for new jobs that match your search criteria. Just name your job search, tell us how often you want to get an email notification and click Save. How to save a search. The government is looking to fill positions that are in high demand. Find your opportunity to shape America's future.
